Summary: I was on the cell phone from the balcony of our house about 8Pm. I saw what looked like a string of 4 to 5 white lights in a straight horizontal line stationary...
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Quezon City
There were 2 other sightings in Quezon City on or around February 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI have 3 cell phone photos that I will send upon finding the required cable to down load from my cell phone. Amasing photos but blurry as the object is very far away when I took the pictures. The photos are pretty amazing to me as they were not that visable with the naked eye. It looked like a string of 4 to 5 lights on a horizontal plane that tilted back AS IT MOVED WEST as it was over my GATED subdivison CALLED Filinvest 2 about 2 km from the Batasan Congressional Building complex IN NORTHERN QUEZON CITY , METRO MANILA. The oblect of lights was traveling from the east to the west very slowly. It seemed like a sigle white light IN THE PHOTOS at original (NO ZOOM ) setting but when full zoomed in it became a green saucer shaped object with a light bar under it. One CLOSE UP is white in color and the bars below is yellow and green . This EVENT started at APPROXIMATELY 8PM Manila Time on 22 February and passed over the horizon out of sight by 8:25 PM . AS I TYPE THIS REPORT MY HEART HAS FINALLY STOPPED POUNDING AS IT WAS SO WILD TO SEE THIS AS MY 2 HOUSE MAIDS WAS ABLE TO HELP ME CONFIRM WHAT I WAS SEEING WITH MY NOT SO GOOD EYES. I HAVE HAD A OPERATION IN BOSTON EAR AND EYE CLINIC SOME YEARS AGO TO REMOVE A CATARAC AND INSTALL A REPLACEMENT PLASTIC LENS IN MY LEFT EYE. MY RIGHT EYE IS BAD AS IT REQUIRES A PLASTIC CONTACT LENS AT -5 POWER. tHIS LENS IS USUALLY NOT SO CLEAR BY 8pM FROM THE AIR POLUTION WE HAVE TO ENDURE EVERY DAY HERE. I TRIED TO GET A VIDEO CAMERA FROM OUR BEDROOM BUT IT WAS TOO LATE AS THE OBJECTS WERE ALREADY TO FAR AWAY. I HAVE NEVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE THIS AS THEY 4 TO 5 WHITE LIGHTS WERE IN LINE. IF I HAD TO MAKE A DISTANCE ESTIMATE FROM ME WHEN I FIRST SIGHTED IT I WILL SAY IT WAS MAYBE MORE THAN 5 MILES AWAY AT A ANGLE TO THE SURFACE OF MAYBE 15 DEGREES. AS IT SLOWELY MOVED AWAY IT MAY HAVE BEEN 8 TO 9 MILES AWAY AND DOWN TO AN ANGLE OF LESS THAN 8 DEGREES FROM THE HORIZON. THE ENLARGED PICTURE ARE FROM THIS OBJECT AND I NEVER SAW THE 5 LIGHTS IN A LINE IN THE ZOOM MODE OF THE CELL CAMERA. IM A BELIVER THEY ARE AROUND US AND IM NOW MORE THAN EXCITED TO SHARE WHAT WE SAW AS I HAVE MY TWO HOUSE MAIDS WHO WAS THERE TO SEE IT ALSO.
